parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To kindle, set on fire, light. From ana and hapto; to enkindle.
